data.title: Thought
data.copy: What is the next thought you are about to have?

data.title: Thought
data.copy: Notice the next 5 thoughts you are about to have.

data.title: Thought
data.copy: Who is observing the thought "I am"?

data.title: Thought
data.copy: Can you observe the space in which thoughts are occurring?

data.title: Thought
data.copy: Observe the space *in between* your thoughts.

data.title: Thought
data.copy: With your eyes open, notice the next 10 thoughts.

exerciseData.description: Include the Thought category in your practice to become more mindful of your stream of thoughts and to observe their flow.
